Description: Amazing 4 BR 4.5 BA home with artist/owner inspired architectural details. Must see to fully appreciate the breadth and scale of his vision.. Can be used as a single family home or divided into 2 separate 2BR 2BA living spaces -- each with a full kitchen and separate entry if desired --perfect for an au-pair or in-law suite. Half a block from community pier on the Chesapeake Bay.

Description: Home has lovely Chesapeake Bay views and steps to community water access. This 3 BR/2.5 BA home has beautiful hardwoods and an open feel with 9ft ceilings recessed lighting large front porch mature landscaping balcony off master bedroom ceramic bath with jetted soaking tub and patio. Community water and boat access and community clubhouse available for rental.

Kitchen:
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Ice Maker
* Oven
* Range
* Refrigerator
